name: Ice Road Trucker
description:
Ice Road Trucker the game as you battle the toughest roads the world has to offer.

This fun, all-terrain driving simulation activity for older kids & teens features authentic 3D graphics that make for a real edge-of-your seat ride. Controlling your powerful truck is not all plain sailing!

Tackle slippery terrain, avoid frozen lakes, and boost over ramps to see how many miles you can go before the ice road claims another victim.

So get ready to enjoy driving Ice Road Trucker.
